document_data.name: Mannus
document_data.mainbody: '''Mannus''' was a house guard for the noble [[Seasilver]] family of [[Marsember]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: He was a rather tall and gangly fellow.
document_data.History: When the city of [[Marsember]] was invaded by the [[Shadovar]], on [[Uktar 2]] of the {{YearlinkName|1486}}, Mannus failed to heed the warning of the servant [[Odelia]], leaving [[Arietta Seasilver|Lady Arietta]] alone with two shades. He and his fellow guard [[Suther]] were under strict orders not to yet the young noblewoman leave her family's estate in the city. They both failed in their duties.
